message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $150 to you, and we're confident it will meet all your needs. We're currently offering it to you for $140. This is a special introductory price, so don't miss out!

I appreciate your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to see a bit more flexibility on the price.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider your offer. To move forward, I propose a price of $130 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for both of us.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $125 for the product. Can you consider this price?
